column5: This MSc course in Banking and Finance will enhance your professional skills and employability in the banking and finance sector.Course overviewAligned with the Chartered Banker Institute (CBI) syllabus, this course gives you the skills you need to work in today’s banking and finance industry with a focus on concepts such as credit risk management, strategy, corporate governance and ethics, sustainability, and quantitative techniques.You will learn through hands-on experience the importance of innovation within banking and finance to increase your future employability.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
